com.apdplat.platform.spring

类 APDPlatContextLoaderListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoader
      • com.apdplat.platform.spring.APDPlatContextLoaderListener
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public class APDPlatContextLoaderListener
extends org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoader
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    Bootstrap listener to start up and shut down Spring's root WebApplicationContext. Simply delegates to ContextLoader as well as to ContextCleanupListener.

    This listener should be registered after org.springframework.web.util.Log4jConfigListener in web.xml, if the latter is used.

    从以下版本开始:
    17.02.2003
    作者:
    Juergen Hoeller
    另请参阅:
    org.springframework.web.util.Log4jConfigListener

      • createContextLoader

        @Deprecated
protected org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoader createContextLoader()
        已过时。 in favor of simply subclassing APDPlatContextLoaderListener itself (which extends ContextLoader, as of Spring 3.0)
        Create the ContextLoader to use. Can be overridden in subclasses.
        返回:
        the new ContextLoader

      • getContextLoader

        @Deprecated
public org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoader getContextLoader()
        已过时。 in favor of simply subclassing APDPlatContextLoaderListener itself (which extends ContextLoader, as of Spring 3.0)
        Return the ContextLoader used by this listener.
        返回:
        the current ContextLoader
